page.title: 16SATMAR POND AND WILD FLOWERS
page.content: At Satmar there is a large pond which we investigated.Around the edges grow Yellow Iris,Great Pond Sedge, Marsh Marigolds,Great Reedmace and Rushes.Pondweed and Water Lilies grow in the centre of the pond.A Moorhen was sitting on a clutch of eggs. Dragonflies and Mayflies were flying about and we saw several of the following creatures,Sticklebacks,Frogs in various stages,Caddis Larvae, Water Boatman,Pond Skater,Water Spider and Water Snails in or near the water. There is a wide variety of wild flowers in the Capel area which we studied.Most grow either in the miles of hedgerows or by the sides of fields e.g Poppies,2 types of Nettle,Ivy, Bluebells,Scarlet Pimpernel,Snowberry, Clematis,Viper"s Bugloss,Blackberry, Red and Bladder Campion,2 types of Clover,Rape,Dog Daisies and many more.
